Text: Not being picky but anyone who has done it please snap a desktop pic and upload to a pic host site, would like to see.  Snap a few if poss.

in case people don't know Stardock makes a beta application that adds a start menu and i heard of one called classic shell too.
I hear the stardock one is impressive with amount of features.

and maybe that's what the guy posted here but since he has no title or description then i have no clue what this is and i don't download things just find out what it is lol
To see the screenshots: open google search in images and type 'start8".

very smart tool...perhaps makes up one feature that was being missed in win 8....it does disable the quick access to metro interface from the bottom left screen corner of the desktop ...but very smart tool all the same
very smart tool...makes up one missing feature in win 8..it disables the quick access to metro interface from bottom left screen though
